short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension swiftly provides submission links, expediting grading by inviting mentors or peers for evaluation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Coursera Get Shareable Link extension is a lightweight tool designed for Coursera learners who want to quickly obtain links for their submissions. This facilitates speeding up the grading process as you can promptly invite mentors or peers to evaluate your submissions. 

The extension operates based on the following criteria:
1. Fast: Allows you to quickly retrieve links without consuming much time.
2. Lightweight: Does not burden your system when in use.
3. Stable: Functions reliably without errors or interruptions.
4. User-friendly: Easy to use and understand, ensuring everyone can conveniently utilize it.

p/s: This is a project inspired by the delisted project of the same name.
